TriagingSteps: Try to reproduce the issue with diffrent creds and see if that works or not.
Try to check in dev tool and see if any issue with recaptcha.
Try to check in dev tool and see if any API calls are failing or throwing error response.
Verify the Logs for failed calls in dev tool.
If nothing is failing in dev then check logs for BSSP root application and see if anything can be reported for backends.
Ask TCOE teams and get confirmtaion about the data seeding.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.

Resolutions.DueTo: Error while loading the BSSP login url
TriagingSteps: if you are getting 404 error for all content files then check if deployment properly done in the BBM environment or not.
if you are getting 500 error then try to validate the IIS with Another working slot.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
Try to reproduce the issue with diffrent creds and see if that works or not.
Try to check in dev tool and see if any API calls are failing or thworing error response.
Verify the Logs for failed calls in dev tool.
If nothing is failing in dev then check logs for BSSP root application and see if anything can be reported for backends.
Ask TCOE teams and get confirmtaion about the data seeding.
CHeck in DTM and see if anything can be traceble.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.

IssueName: BSSP Shop Landing Page Loading error

Resolutions.DueTo: BSSP Shop Landing Page Loading error
TriagingSteps: if you are getting 404 error for all content files then check if deployment properly done in the BBM environment or not.
if you are getting 500 error then try to validate the IIS with Another working slot.
Check logs for BBM shop and see if any logs related to LMS or any other backends.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
Try to reproduce the issue with diffrent Address.
Check if recaptcha enabled in Browser or not. for qualification recaptcha should be enabled.
Check with ESB team and get confirmation about the LMS service. LMS should up and running for any qualification flows.
Check logs for BBM shop and see if any logs related to LMS , EOM ProductQualification and  any other backends.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
Try to Reproduce the issue with diffrent data if possible.
Check if recaptcha enabled in Browser or not. for registration recaptcha should be enabled.
Check logs for BBM root logs and see if any logs related to any backends.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
Try to Reproduce the issue with diffrent data if possible.
Check if recaptcha enabled in Browser or not. for forgot password recaptcha should be enabled.
Check logs for BBM root logs and see if any logs related to any backends.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
If you are getting 404 error for all content files then check if deployment properly done in the BBM shop 365 environment or not.
If you are getting 500 error then try to validate the IIS with Another working slot.
Check logs for BBM shop 365 and see if any logs related to LMS or any other backends.
Try to reproduce the issue with diffrent Address.
Check if recaptcha enabled in Browser or not. for qualification recaptcha should be enabled.
Check with ESB team and get confirmation about the LMS service. LMS should up and running for any qualification flows.
Check logs for BBM shop and see if any logs related to LMS , EOM ProductQualification and  any other backends.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
Check with TCOE team and get confirmation about IDR backend secured or not.
if IDR backend is not secure then reject the defect.
if it is secured then try to check for logs and provide those Logs to TCOE and ask them to check with IDR backends.
Most of time this Testcase will get deffered to Soak or Prod.
Please test the flow with your Belldev creds and this should work with your belldev creds.
TCOE sometime wont use proper creds to test this flow.
If you are geeting issue post login then try to check in logs and see if anything can be traceble.
Based on logs if you suspect it could be code issue then engage our CCA with proper Logs.
